ModMetaData.name: Hold the Grenades
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
"Fire at will" defaults to disabled when pawns are drafted if they are equipped with grenades or launchers.
These vanilla weapons are affected by this mod: - Frag grenades - EMP grenades - Molotov cocktails - Smoke launcher - Incendiary launcher - EMP launcher - Doomsday rocket launcher - Triple rocket launcher - Incinerator
Modded weapons whose projectile creates some kind of AoE explosion should also work.
=== Updates === 08/05/2024: Restore 1.3 support 05/31/2024: Turn off fire at will for incinerator 03/20/2024: Updated to 1.5 10/26/2022: Updated to 1.4
